thread.title: BRIEF-Neptune Dash Commences Incubation Of Neptune Stake, Intends To Spin Out First Proof-Of-Stake Mining Company

title: BRIEF-Neptune Dash Commences Incubation Of Neptune Stake, Intends To Spin Out First Proof-Of-Stake Mining Company

organizations.name: first proof-of-stake mining company reuters staff

text: February 26, 2018 / 3:12 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Neptune Dash Commences Incubation Of Neptune Stake, Intends To Spin Out First Proof-Of-Stake Mining Company Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Neptune Dash Technologies Corp: * NEPTUNE DASH COMMENCES INCUBATION OF NEPTUNE STAKE AND INTENDS TO SPIN OUT FIRST PROOF-OF-STAKE MINING COMPANY * NEPTUNE DASH - ‍COMMENCED INCUBATING PROOF-OF-STAKE MINING OPERATION TO MINE ETHEREUM, CARDANO, EOS, NEO AND NEM, AMONG OTHER DIGITAL TOKENS​ * NEPTUNE - UNIT COMMENCED INCUBATING A PROOF-OF-STAKE MINING OPERATION TO MINE ETHEREUM, CARDANO, EOS, NEO AND NEM, AMONG OTHER DIGITAL TOKENS * NEPTUNE DASH - ‍MAY CONSIDER REORGANIZING BUSINESS BY WAY OF SPIN-OUT OF NEPTUNE STAKE TO SHAREHOLDERS BY PLAN OF ARRANGEMENT TO BE COMPLETED IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
